{{wikipedia|Hangzhou}}
===Etymology===
Used out of hope that the northern empire would be recovered shortly and the imperial court returned to the former Song capital at [[Bianjing]] (now [[Kaifeng]]).

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=Xíngzài
|cat=pn
}}

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography|euphemism}} [[Xingzai]] ("[[temporary|Temporary]] [[residence|Residence]]"), a [[former]] [[nickname]] of [[Lin'an]] ([[now]] [[Hangzhou]]) [[when]] it was the [[capital]] of the [[Southern Song]] [[dynasty]].
